code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE='/api';export const createOrder=data=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/orders"),data);export const getDashboardOrders=()=>axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/orders/dashboard"));export const updateOrderStatus=(id,status)=>axios.patch("".concat(API_BASE,"/orders/").concat(id,"/status"),{status});export const fetchVehicleInfoByPlate=plate=>axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/vehicles/").concat(plate));
